name: VBRandom
summary: VBRandom is a pseudo-random numbers generator. Using of VBRandom simplifies random numbers creation code.
description:
VBRandom is a pseudo-random numbers generator. Using of VBRandom simplifies random numbers creation code.

It uses arc4random() function.

## Supported features
1. random NSUInteger
2. random NSInteger
3. random double
4. random BOOL
